trailingComments.value: if PointLight: lightPosition[i].w === 1.0      if DirectionalLight: lightPosition[i].w === 0.0

right.value: rt0 += Kd * lightDiffuse[i] * vec4(diffuse, diffuse, diffuse, 1.0) * surfaceColor;
right.raw: '    rt0 += Kd * lightDiffuse[i] * vec4(diffuse, diffuse, diffuse, 1.0) * surfaceColor;\n'

right.value: rt0 += Ks * lightDiffuse[i] * vec4(specular, specular, specular, 0.0);
